text: badâ€Œduon ne kaha ki, "ham eemaan lae." kah do, "tum eemaan nahin lae. kintu yoon kaho, ham to aagyaakaaree hue eemaan to abhee tumhaare dilon mein daakhil hee nahin hua. yadi tum allaah aur usake rasool kee aagya ka paalan karo to vah tumhaare karmon mein se tumhaare lie kuchh kam na karega. nishchay hee allaah bada kshamaasheel, atyant dayaavaan hai.
